markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Juvenile Flight](/Feats.aspx?ID=2653) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Strix" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=342" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 137 <sup>3.0</sup>

**Frequency**
once per day

**Prerequisites**
[Fledgling Flight](/Feats.aspx?ID=2649)

</column>

---

Your wings become stronger, allowing you to fly farther.  The fly Speed you gain from Fledgling Flight increases to 25 feet.

<title level="2">Juvenile Flight leads to...</title>
[Fully Flighted](/Feats.aspx?ID=2657)
name: Juvenile Flight
search_markdown:
<traits>
<trait label="Strix" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=342" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 137 <sup>3.0</sup>

**Frequency**
once per day

**Prerequisites**
[Fledgling Flight](/Feats.aspx?ID=2649)

</additional-info>

---

<summary>
You unfold your wings for travel and can keep them unfolded for 10 minutes.
</summary>
summary: You unfold your wings for travel and can keep them unfolded for 10 minutes.
summary_markdown: You unfold your wings for travel and can keep them unfolded for 10 minutes.
